verses.name: Judges 10:15
verses.text: And the children of Israel said unto the Lord, We have sinned: do thou unto us whatsoever seemeth good unto thee; deliver us only, we pray thee, this day.

verses.name: Judges 10:16
verses.text: And they put away the strange gods from among them, and served the Lord: and his soul was grieved for the misery of Israel.

verses.name: Judges 10:17
verses.text: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together, and encamped in Gilead. And the children of Israel assembled themselves together, and encamped in Mizpeh.
